summary: Kaziuk, a stubborn peasant and his pregnant wife live in a backwood village, unaffected by the civilization. The village is once visited by a couple of wanderers, and strange things start ... See full summary »
cast: Krzysztof Majchrzak|Anna Seniuk|Joanna Sienkiewicz|Jerzy Block|Marek Siudym|Tomasz Jarosinski|Franciszek Pieczka|Anna Milewska|Arkadiusz Bazak|Aleksander Fogiel|Jan Jurewicz|Zbigniew Kaczmarek|Jacek Kalucki|Marek Kepinski|Jan Pawel Kruk|Tadeusz Wojtych|Wojciech Zagórski|Sylwester Maciejewski
title: Konopielka
